title: Shop Vibe
description: E-commerce platform for men’s and women’s clothing with social login, password reset, cart, wishlist, and Paymob payment integration.
alt: Shop Vibe e-commerce platform by Mina Mamdouh with authentication, cart, wishlist, and Paymob integration

title: Healing Haven
description: Modern healthcare platform to book medical appointments online and explore a wide range of healthcare services. Built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Nodemailer for email notifications.
alt: Healing Haven healthcare platform by Mina Mamdouh built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Nodemailer

title: Weather App
description: Responsive weather app with real-time data and geolocation using Next.js and OpenWeatherMap API.
alt: Weather App by Mina Mamdouh built with Next.js and OpenWeatherMap API

title: Chat App
description: Real-time chat app with authentication and messaging using React and Socket.io.
alt: Chat App by Mina Mamdouh with real-time messaging using React and Socket.io
